prompt_pro.title: Prompt Pro
prompt_pro.tagline: AI turns your vague ideas into professional instruction prompts.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Global Ultra-Fast GIF Converter. We are committed to protecting your privacy.

collection.title: 2. Data Collection
collection.process_content: Your files never leave your device. All video processing is performed entirely in your browser using WebAssembly (ffmpeg.wasm). We do not upload, store, or have access to any videos or GIFs you create.
collection.analytics_content: We use the following third-party services:

use.title: 3. How We Use Information
use.content: The limited data we collect is used to:

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can control them via browser settings.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content: Since all processing happens in your browser, your files are inherently secure.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, please contact us at:
